casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shan CARTER. No. 131P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 25, 2004. Sharon L. Smith, Kristin D. Parks, Raleigh, for Carter. John Carriker, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of March 2004 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Response to Petition:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 5th day of April 2004 to file Response. By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of March 2004."

*201
